_components._string: You can only purchase up to 5 items!

_components._string: There is currently no market for this product and cannot be sold! Please pay attention to the market situation, thank you for your understanding!

_components._string: The market is stable and there is no market news yet!

_components._string: You can use 0.01ETH or 50% of total assets to expand 10 positions! When using cash, you need to ensure that you have sufficient cash, otherwise you will not be able to expand! The maximum number of positions is 200!
_components._N$string: You can use 0.01ETH or 50% of total assets to expand 10 positions! When using cash, you need to ensure that you have sufficient cash, otherwise you will not be able to expand! The maximum number of positions is 200!

_components._string: Are you sure you want to end this year’s market trading and head to next year?
